resources.string:
1. After setting up your new device, open your Wifi settings 
 2. Connect your phone to BotanicoAP
 3. Click on notification
 4. From the menu select "Configure WiFi" 
 5. Select the network you want Arduino to use 
 6. Input the network password
 "
Connect Arduino to your WiFi network
Botanico is a mobile application which helps you ...
